plot: In a NATO bunker, a young soldier, his wife and his son are made prisoners by a group of Russian terrorists who are threatening to use nuclear weapons.
title: Der Bunker - Eine todsichere Falle
plot_es: In a NATO bunker, a young soldier, his wife and his son are made prisoners by a group of Russian terrorists who are threatening to use nuclear weapons.
plot_en: In a NATO bunker, a young soldier, his wife and his son are made prisoners by a group of Russian terrorists who are threatening to use nuclear weapons.
